arabic.title: إنت النسخة الأصلية .. إنت إستثنائي
text: انت مين انت اللي في منك في الكون كتير
والا انت عارف انك انت غير
انت مين بتحب نفسك بس وغيرها مافيش
والا اللى علشان الناس ديما يعيش
انت مين متردد في الحياة بين البينين
والا اللي عارف رايحة الخطوة فين
قلبك كريم ومحدد الطريق انت ايه
التاريخ بيقولوا إن البشر هما نوعين ناس بتأثر
النسخة الأصلية مفيش منها وضد التقليد
انت اللى لمعة النجوم بتبان في عنيك
انت اللى كل فيك بيقويك بيعليك
انت اللي عمره ما لحظه خاف انت اكتشاف
ومين يقدر عليك انت احلى حاجة فيك
مش زي الباقي شايف بكرة وباصص لبعيد
انت مش حاجة عادية النسخة الأصلية مفيش منها وضد التقليد

english.title: "You are Exceptional"
text: Who are you ? Are you from  the ordinary people in the Universe,Or you know  you are different ?
You have a walking path ,You will walk through it
Who  are you?Do you love  just yourself ?
OR,  You devoted yourself to help people
Like the  cloud  is rain and good
Who are you , hesitant in life between this and that
Or, who knows where the step goes?
Your heart is generous and you know the way.
History says that humans are two types , people  who affect and people who  are spectators
And who are you between the two?
You see tomorrow and you look forward
You are not an ordinary man
The original copy,it is one and  against imitation
You , the glory of the stars appears in your eyes , Every thing in you makes you strong and high
You, who has never been  afraid, you are a discovery
And who is can defeat  you, you are the best thing in you
Not like the rest of, you see tomorrow and look forward
You are not  an ordinary ,original copy, it is one and against imitation

arabic.title: ابن مصر
text: قالوا عني زمان موهوم بيضيع وقت
أمشي عالصعب وعرفت انا لما كبرت
أنا رافع راسي تملي لفوق طول العمر
ماقدرش أعيش أبداً يوم غير وانا حر
أنا رافع راسي تملي لفوق طول العمر
ماقدرش أعيش أبداً يوم غير وانا حر

english.title: Son of Egypt
text: Here I believed in my dream and started
In the past they were describing me as a delusional wasting his time
But I've never given up or surrendered
I fell down and stood back. Now is not the same as yesterday
Here is the bottom of my heart
This is what gives me power
And here I came before others
From here I decided, after thinking
To step over difficulties. I learned when I grew old
That what you think of as a crisis1
Look at those, who laughed at you in the past
On your loss. But you won
I'm raising my head up high my whole life
I can't live for single day unless I'm free
I've been through countless crises and situations
But clashes make stronger not destroy
I've been through countless crises and situations
But clashes make stronger not destroy
I'm raising my head up high my whole life
I can't live for single day unless I'm free

arabic.title: احساسك ايه
text: اليوم اللي تبقي فيه دايما حواليا

english.title: What are Your Feelings
text: As I am coming to your house
I'm coming to tell your parents
I'm coming to see everybody in the house
The words are in my heart
But I hope I can say them
Certainly you are nervous (your heart is dancing)
And certainly you are (your heart is) worried
But I am like you and even more
The day that you will always be around me
I will continue to love you and care for you
The closest people to my heart
This is my father and this is my mother
And of course you know my sister
He doesn't want to call me
Because he is more afraid than I am

english.title: Asa3ab 7aga
text: the hardest thing in the world
that the one you love doesn't understand
that you love him and think about him
the sweetest thing in the world
that he/she comes to you in one second
that he happnes to feel what you're feeling
and comes to tell you his eyes
and i wish your heart calls me,i only think about you
when you'll come and say it to me?
you're keeping me up at night
and you made the little one and the big one laughing about me
and i'm familiar with the that thing(the fact of not caring about his beloved)
i see the love in your eyes
what do you hide from me ,i'll keep your secret*
the hardest thing in the world that the one you love doesn't understand that you love him and think about him

arabic.title: اكيد فى مصر
text: لما تلاقي الجد في ايده حفيده
وبينده وسط الطريق ويقوله يا جده
و يبقى انت اكيد في مصر

english.title: Akeed fi masr
text: When you see the grandfather with his grandson in his hand
And in the other hand theres prayer beads
And theres innocent feeling in his face
He is just bringing his new galabia today
And he is calling his grandfather in the half way
And he is handling his hands and saying I want to do cleanness
And saying to him come on to pray the afternoon
When you find the church having warm and nice environment
And every corner of it ,is witness about all the history
Here ,the jesus and our virgin lady ,lived years ago
Among their good people and family
This is the speech of girgis and uncle nasr
When you find in your wound that theres thousands of crying eyes on it
And when you find in your happiness that theres shrills and embellishment around you
And your simple house change to a castle
And the goodness inside you has no limit

arabic.title: الفستان الابيض
text: انا عارف انى بحلم والحلم جميل وبيحلالى
ال ايه قاعده جامبى والناس شيفاكى وحسدانى مهو طبعا
الاقيكى جايه من بعيد لابسه الفستان الابيض والمزيكا تقول وتعيد
والاقى دقات قلبى من كتر الفرحه تزيد
الاقى لمه واحلى دمعه من عيون فرحانه
ما خلاص العين هتنام بعد ليالى كتير سهرانه
ودى ربكه ما جت على بالى
اصمله عليهم عينى عليهم ربنا يحميهم
وتملى دسته عيال بيتهم وتطلع عنيهم
يقولو عقبالنا فى زيها فى الجنه
الاقيكى جايه من بعيد لابسه الفستان الابيض والمزيكا تقول وتعيد
والاقى دقات قلبى من كتر الفرحه تزيد
الاقى لمه واحلى دمعه من عيون فرحانه
ما خلاص العين هتنام بعد ليالى كتير سهرانه
ودى ربكه ما جت على بالى
اصمله عليهم عينى عليهم ربنا يحميهم
وتملى دسته عيال بيتهم وتطلع عنيهم
يقولو عقبالنا فى زيها فى الجنه
مين يطول يعيش فى حقيقه فى زيها فى الجنه

english.title: The white dress
text: I know I'm dreaming ,the dream is beautiful and I love it
(I imagine)you are sitting next to me ,people see you and envy me of course
you are my moon,light,shadow and hopes
and I always wished to tell you that
every time I close my eyes
I see you coming from away wearing the white dress and music is being played and repeated
and I see you laughing to me and telling me we become together
and my heart beats increases due to happiness
and i find crowd and tears from happy eyes
finally the eye will sleep after a lot of sleepless nights
I go around to let people see the ring
I never imagined that confusing situation
may the name of ALLAH be upon them,my eyes on them,ALLAH protects them
and may they have a dozen of children annoying them
may people come to see them and say we wish to be like them
who can live in such sweetness found only in heaven
every time I close my eyes
I see you coming from away wearing the white dress and music is being played and repeated
and I see you laughing to me and telling me we become together
and my heart beats increases due to happiness
and i find crowd and tears from happy eyes
finally the eye will sleep after a lot of sleepless nights
I go around to let people see the ring
I never imagined that confusing situation
may the name of ALLAH be upon them,my eyes on them,ALLAH protects them
and may they have a dozen of children annoying them
may people come to see them and say we wish to be like them
who can live in such sweetness found only in heaven

arabic.title: الليلة
text: الليلة غير كل يوم و ليلة
و الليلة . غير كل يوم و ليلة
و ده رق و دي كمنجة
من غير لا فراق ولا بعد
من غير لا فراق ولا بعد
دا انا قلبي و عمري ملكك من الليلة
دا انا قلبي و عمري ملكك من الليلة
و ده رق و دي كمنجة
من غير لا فراق ولا بعد
من غير لا فراق ولا بعد

english.title: Tonight
text: Tonight isn't like everyday and every night.
We hear the music in our hearts.
Tonight isn't like everyday and every night.
We hear the music in our hearts.
My heart is a great band,
And tonight it will sing only for you.
My heart and my life from today on is yours.
My heart and my life from today on is yours.
My heart is a great band,
And tonight it will sing only for you.

arabic.title: بيت جدتي
text: فتحت عنيا لقيت ناس ولمة وبيت
ويوم الجمعة مليان بعيلة بتملي المكان
حب كبير فرحة وخير وإحساس بالأمان
بيت جدتي الجميل موجود هنا بقاله زمان
كبار وصغيرين حبينه تاخدنا الدنيا ومش ناسينه
واللي سابونا مش سايبينه طيفهم بينا مالي الأركان
من بدري الصبح وأنا صغير وولادي اهم والله ما اتغير
لعب وعيلة كأنه عيد .. راحة ونور عمال بيزيد
في الدنيا دي لما جيت واخدوني وروحنا هناك
عشت فيه كان ليا سبوع حلقات وبرجلات
شايف كل حياتي فيه حاجات جاية وذكريات
وأول مرة فيه صليت وهنا كتابي أتكتب

english.title: My Grandma’s House
text: I opened my eyes and found people and congregations and home
And on Fridays, it’s crowded with a family that fills up the space
A huge love, happiness and benevolence, and a feeing of safety
My grandma’s beautiful house has been here for ages
Old and young, we’ve loved it - the world takes us and we still won’t forget it
And those who have gone, we haven’t left them - their shadows fill the corners between us
From early in the morning when I was young and here are my children now - I swear it hasn’t changed
Fun and family, as if it were a holiday - relaxation and lightness and it’s just getting better
When I first came into this world, they took me there
I stayed there at only a week old, rings and pagodas 1
I see my whole life - memories are coming back to me
And the first time I prayed, I was here and here, my book was written2
Eid breakfast, the smell of ta’miya 4
Our traditions live on, no matter our absences
However much I walk, I always have a place
However far I’ve gone, I’ll always come back
I left my heart and my address there
For me, that door is always open

arabic.title: بيتي ومطرحي
text: ان انتي سكني اللي باسكن ليه

english.title: My Home and My Place
text: You are my home and my place (where I belong)
I don't know if you know
That you are where I live and relax - where my heart is awake
It's door is your heart and your eyes are its windows
You make me see the light that I need
You are my life and my world
And that is my hope and happiness
You are my support and strength and that pushes me to go on
Come to me we are made for each other
The two of us will be one for all of our lives

arabic.title: تبات و نبات
text: اسمي هو الي حيخدوه مني وبس
اسمي هو الي حيخدو مني وبس
حيخدو الي عمري ما كنت القاه
يا سلام لو يخدو الحنية منك .. ويخافو عليا
يخدك كل ما فيك .. جرأتك والبراءة في عنيك
يخدو سحرك وتأثيره ويكونو عليا بيغيرو
يخدو منك شقاوتك ويخدو في الجد قساوتك
يخدو سحرك وتأثيره ويكونو عليا بيغيرو
يخدو منك شقاوتك ويخدو في الجد قساوتك
وطبعا يخدو غلاوتك في قلبي واعشقهم ادك
وطبعا يخدو غلاوتك في قلبي واعشقهم ادك
الي يكفي في قلبي كل معنى الغرام
حفضل اصونك واشيلك يا ضي العين
من الهوى الطاير وكل غاير ونار العين

english.title: Tabaat W Nabat
text: when we live happily ever after
and we have boys and girls
my name is the only thing theyll take from me
theyll take your kindness and beauty
theyll take your love of life
theyll take the smile of an angel
and eyes more beautiful than the sky
theyll take a piece of heaven
theyll take what i thought i could never find
youre the most beautiful person ive ever

english.title: Tabat wa Nabat
text: when we'll live stable and nabat ... we'll have boys and girls
my name they shall take.. only my name
they will be gifted ur sweetness and ur beauty
will be gifted ur heart and ur imagination .
they'll be gifted ur love for life
they'll be gifted ur angelous smile.
and eyes more beautiful than the sky
they'll be gifted in you kindness
they'll be gifted freedom like in heaven
they'll be gifted in our country
the'll be gifted things I neved had
you are the prettiest person I ever seen .
ya salam if they'll take all of those gifts
they'll be gifted ur honesty and ur innocenty
they'll be gifted ur charming and its effect .
And of course they'll be gifted in ur preciously inside my heart And I shall love them as I love you.
after all.. I couldnt say it all
but beleive me.. what I have isinde of my heart .. is enough
And I shall hide you on the shadow of my heart.. ur my light
from this love Im like a bird flying.. fire in my eyes

arabic.title: تمثيلية
text: وبطل مهزوم مهزوز وسنين في حياته تفوت
قدام الناس عاملين عايشين وإحنا بنموت
والبطل اللي بيعمل قال عايش دلوقتي آهو مات
خلصت الدور عيشت الشخصية وعجبت الجمهور وخلاص
أنا عايز أعيش وكفاية أستنى في سعادة مبتجيش
ساعات في نهاية حزينة عكس البدايات
متسابة كتير في تراب وعشان أهملها سنين
النهاردة مفيناش لا حياة ولا روح
تفاصيلنا دموع وجروح وأكيد في دي متفقين
دي حياتنا أنا وإنتي تليفون وشوية وهيفصل والشاحن مركون
محطوط في مكان مجهول ضاع منك أو مني مش فارقة مين المسؤول
خلصت الدور عيشت الشخصية وعجبت الجمهور وخلاص
أنا عايز أعيش وكفاية أستنى في سعادة مبتجيش
ساعات في نهاية حزينة عكس البدايات

english.title: An act
text: An act... with an old, corny scenario
With a defeated hesitated protagonist. Whose years are passing by
An act we have been living for years
We act as if we were living while we are dying
On whom are we lying or playing?
We suffer. But we bother only about others
But the protagonist, who plays the role of a living one, is dead now
I was living in this character and I've finished playing my role. Audience liked me.
Put our names in credits on the screen
I want to live my life. I'm done with waiting for a piece of happiness that will never come
Sometimes the end comes, unlike the opening, tragic
You and I are just a portrait of a lying painter
That is left for long to dust. And since it has been neglected for years
Our details are tears and wounds. We are equal in that
This is my and your life. A phone with a low battery and the charger is
put away in an unknown place,lost by you or by me. It doesn't matter whose fault
I was living in this character and I've finished playing my role. Audience liked me.
Put our names in credits on the screen
I want to live my life. I'm done with waiting for a piece of happiness that will never come
Sometimes the end comes, unlike the opening, tragic

english.title: Hadar
text: your life have been crowded with people
to come closer i became a picture,for me its an achivement
i reached you though the people who surrounds you
and i made you love me
and it was for me to lose you
when i face you with the truth
and it was hard what i built in year would be lost in a minute
ok!i'll sing in your wedding today and im telling you
when did i refuse to do you something even the stars of the sky
i tried to get for you
and what i consider in this world except see you happy and remove your tear
and how do i ask you to feel me and i didnt tell you?
حاضر هغنيك فى فرحك اليله دى بقولهالك
وازاى اطلب منك انك تحسى بيا وانا عمرى ما قلتلك

arabic.title: حكايتى معاك
text: حكايتى معاك كان فيها شوق وغرام
واعرف فى يوم انسى اللى فات
بس ما نولت اللى فى بالى

english.title: My story with you
text: My story with you had yearning and carving
It had flame and pain, good and bad days
This is my story with you
We were lovers who suffered from farewell and pain and after all this days
We became like mirage, in my story with you
I would have like to live beautiful nights and to know how to forget the past
But i got what in my mind and i kept living on memories
It was easy for you to say that you're with me and the dream is last long
But saying is not enough and you have chosen the easiest way
The easiest way, in my story with you
I tried to forget you, i went here and there maybe i can heal ..
The wound that left for me from my story with you
I would have like to live beautiful nights and to know how to forget the past
But i got what in my mind and i kept living on memories
It was easy for you to say that you're with me and the dream is last long
But saying is not enough and you have chosen the easiest way
The easiest way, in my story with you

arabic.title: حلم بعيد
text: ده أنا اللي في ليل هواكي وحيد

english.title: A Dream Far Away
text: or are you from the heavens?
show up only once every 100 years
And you're still not even aware
I found and saw in her eyes
you are even more beautiful than it
You are the most person in my life
You are a dream far away
You are a ''possible'' that I wish to turn to certainty
a fantasy my hands want to reach
And I wish for us to finally meet regularly
You are a dream far away
I am alone in the night of your love
I sing, say it and sing some more for you
Your love is a fire that burns in my heart

arabic.title: خليك قريب مني
text: انا لو عليا على كفوفي اشيلك
وفي اخر الدنيا برضو حجري واجيلك
بس انت تاشر واوعى تحتار وتفكر
ده انا احلى دنيا بلقيها حواليكي
ده ما فيش حد يملى مكانك

english.title: Stay Close to Me
text: If it was up to me I would carry you on my palms
And I would run to the end of the world to come to you
Just point, and don't ever think or get confused
I find the most beautiful world around you
And I see my dreams coming in your eyes
And come, let's dance and sing
Don't ever go away from me
I found the world in your arms
Don’t ever go away from me
There is no one that can take your place
If it was up to me
I would die and not leave you
And don't give up on my love
After all, I’m also your love
And don't ever get mad or frown
Keep me in your thoughts , let's not change come let's live, because this life is short
Won't you stay next to me
Come on, let's dance and sing
Don't ever go away from me

english.title: Salam ya Baladi
text: Here is my lover that had knocked on my door
Here is my Nile and here are my pyramids
Here is my father and here is my mother
Here is my honor and here is my blood
Here is my country and here are my grandfathers
And here is where my grandchildren shall be
Here is my past and here are my nights
And here is a memory that belongs to me
And good bye, my country good bye
I will return to you without a doubt

arabic.title: طول ما انتي جنبي
text: عمال اقرص في نفسي كل شوية
ومش مصدق اللي انا دلوقتي فية
يرحم زمن اللي لف و داس
ولا عمري حلمت بأكتر من كدة ليا

english.title: Mahmoud El Esseily | Tool Many Ganby  | English Subtitles
text: once you are next to me i found you bring me a great luck
my sweetheart and i really don't need anything but you
when you are next to me i keep biting  myself many times because   i don't believe that we are really together
my heart was so tough with many people and in front of you i changed to be sensitive
No No No i'm lost , wheres the person who was having mush fun and strong (Talking about himself before he know her )
but in front of you i became so weak
all my life i was dreaming but I've ever  dreamed to have someone like you
and God knows how much i love you
and you will sleep and wake up with much love and caring
and show me what you can do !
my heart was so tough with many people and in front of you i changed to be so sensitive
No No No i'm lost , wheres the person who was having much fun and strong but in front of you i became so weak

arabic.title: فرحة
text: فرحة أخيراً تجمعنا، ولا حد هيقدر يمنعنا
وصبرنا له معنى، ودي فرحة بتجمعنا
وده كل اللي انا عايزه ف حياتي
ولا يهمِّنا مين، دي عيون حاسدين
والحلم ده بتاعنا، ودي فرحة بتجمعنا
يا اصحاب يا اغراب، خلاص كتبنا الكتاب
لو ماشي بعكاز، طقم سنان، أو محتاس
فرحة أخيراً تجمعنا، ولا حد هيقدر يمنعنا
ولا يهمِّنا مين، دي عيون حاسدين
والحلم ده بتاعنا، ودي فرحة بتجمعنا

english.title: A joy
text: At last, a joy makes us together
at last, a joy makes us together, no one can hold us
at last, a joy makes us together
in front of people, you are my wife
and this is what all i want in my life
in front of people, you are my wife
and this is what all i want in my life
we don't care about them, they are evil eyes
and this is a joy makes us together

arabic.title: مجنونة
text: ده الدنيا احلى حاجه فى الوجود
والدنيا ما مجنونه نونا نونا نونا

english.title: Magnouna
text: aldonya ma magnouna magnouna nouna (magnouna is the word he just repeats it and takes the beginning and end of it)
n3eesh el 7a2i2a w nensa el khloud
And love is a must, and love is a must
crazy and love is a must
n3eesh el 7a2i2a w nensa el khloud
And love is a must, and love is a must
a must, a must, a must

arabic.title: من أول مرّة
text: هو ده اللي ضيع قلبه من ايده
كان بيفكر ف ايه؟ ده حرام عليه
اه لو تعرفي اللي ف بالي

english.title: Men awel marra
text: if you wouldn't be with me
cause people would stop in the street and point at me
saying this is the one that has lost his heart from his hands
what was he thinking??? shame on him !!!
the first time i sit down with you
i felt so much passion for you
your charm brought me to earth and left me
i felt like it defeated me
you got me upside down and rearranged my thoughs all over again
so come come ,cause you don't know what's in my imagination
i have for you a million thoughts ,if you just know what's on my mind
my heart has nothing to do about it,making me awake for many nights
gazing in your beautiful eyes,they're defeating me ,defeating me

arabic.title: هشوفك
text: قالوله دا هي زى ما هى
زي ما عن الملايكه ما قالوا

english.title: Hashoufak
text: dear,this is the day i've been waiting for the day you come back to me
after years gone,they told she is the same
but she's bit prettier like what they said about the angels
and the told him that her hair is still short and her laugh would make the strongest heart fly
even if it has been long im waiting and opening the door
i find coming through it after the absence
and before the hands greetings comes the eyes talk
your coming back is more preious that my soul for meا
قالولو شعرها لسه قصير وضحكتها بتطير اجمد قلب من مكانو
يحكى فى عهد اتنين حبو ودابو

arabic.title: هنخاف من ايه
text: ما انا روحى زيك راحت ليك

english.title: What Would We be Scared of?
text: You love me, I've seen it in your eyes
Just like you, my soul has gone to you1
Why would hide for all this time?
By God, please say it to me2
We have finally gotten united in a place
Isn't it such a shame that we remain like this?
The hidden is fated to be unveiled one day
What would we be scared of?
who ever experienced something like it?
Why are you leaving me confused?
I am yours and with you
With you my heart became alive
Why would we postpone the issue for later?
I will become so happy if you say it2
You and I are agreed on many things
My entire life belongs to you

arabic.title: هي
text: ده فيها اللي كنا بندور عليه
ده فِيها اللَيّ كَنّا بندور عَلَيهِ
قلبها هو سرها واكيد الملايكة بتغير منها
هقولها اني بحبها لا الفرصة تضيع
قابلتها وحكيتلها قصتنا انا وانت من قبلها
وشها وانا بقولها في فرحة بنوتة
من زمان وهي كمان يا قلبي حبيتنا
مِن زَمان وَهِيَ كَمان يا قَلْبَيْ حُبِّيّتنا

english.title: She
text: What are you afraid of? And why are you so anxious?
Here is all what we were looking for in her
It's shown in her eyes that she isn't like others
Who have been hurting us, forgetting us
And betraying our love for years
What are you afraid of? And why are you so anxious?
Here is all what we were looking for in her
It's shown in her eyes that she isn't like others
Who have been hurting us, forgetting us
And betraying our love for years
Her secret is her heart. Angels for sure are jealous of her
I shall tell her that I love her or I will miss my chance
And be lost, you and me, afterwards
She is ... she is ... she is ... a reward from heaven
For her ... for her ... I devote her my whole life
I met her and told her our story, you and me, before meeting her
Her face was shining like with a joy of little girl
It turned out that she knows me, but she was shy
She was waiting for me make a move toward her
She was loving us, oh, my heart, already for a long time now
It was us, who didn't notice her love
It turned out that she knows me, but she was shy
She was waiting for me make a move toward her
She was loving us, oh, my heart, already for a long time now
It was us, who didn't notice her love
She is ... she is ... she is ... a reward from heaven
For her ... for her ... I devote her my whole life

arabic.title: وجع الهوى
text: وكان كتير عليا واحدة تملي عليا
حياتي بعد ما كنت أنا انتهيت
مكان في قلبي ليه يا قلبي ليه مادخلتيش
وأكيد مفيش انسان بيجي مكان انسان
ده أنا قلبي ملك لواحدة أنا حبيتها

english.title: The pain of love
text: you're beautiful and you make my life beautiful
and I cannot deny that, as a man, I was hooked
and one was too much to fill
my life after I was done
you loved me, but I didn't love you, and I tried, but couldn't
find a place in my heart. Why, my heart! why couldn't you get in
and surely, no one can replace another one
and it's all clear now.. I've got none
you were the cure to an illness I didn't have
and you were a big dream for someone else
I've felt the pain of love a long time ago
and you're feeling it a lot with me
you showed me heaven and its beauty
and I saw the preciousness of my soul in your eyes
and I'm sorry, I swear, I don't deserve you

arabic.title: أحسن ناس
text: من سيدي بشر ل ابو العباس

english.title: Ahsan Nas
text: here we are chatting,what else we have to do?what else we have to do?
we have the right in having fun ,what else we have to do?what else we have to do?
we want to know the others what else we have to do? we like to be honoured what else we have to do?
and who is our country or yours?the nicest people ,nicest people
souhaj(an egyptian city) is the town of mawaweel(long sad songs without music) souhaj is the tower of children
souhaj oh baby it's the lover of the Nil
here we are chatting,what else we have to do?what else we have to do?
the benha bridge oh my eyes light ,it's the eye of my baby
after separation and missings the love gathered us together
oh isma3iliya(egyptian city) i like to see you in sunset time
i get on a ship me and my the ones i love and we sing an isma3ilian song
oh yalali(it's a musical expression)oh baby yalali
here we are chatting,what else we have to do?what else we have to do?
oh alexandrai(egyptian city also) the nicest people are walking slowly on the beatch
from sidi bashar(egypptian location) to abu abbas(another egypt)
زي القمر بعيون سمرا لابسين عقود فل وياسمين
والنيل بيضحك ويغنى فاركنى وبيسأل عنى اروحله القاه مستنى وجمب منه احسن ناس
ادينا بندردش ورانا ايه ورانا اي

arabic.title: غابت شمسنا
text: غابت شمسنا بس احنا لينا نهار
الحلم لسه فى ارضنا لوحتى صبحت نار
غابت شمسنا بس احنا لينا نهار
الحلم لسه فى ارضنا لوحتى صبحت نار

english.title: Our sun has gone
text: our sun has gone but we're still in day,our dream is still in our land even if it will become on fire.
birds laughing voices made us dream,what is our fault and what is country fault,the world has forgotten us.
our sun has gone but if we feel that we're on one big heart and we take care of it,we will say loudly until our voices reach,isn't that our dream?
our sun has gone but life still exists,whatever happened we will live our dreams.
come closer and love people,because peace is sense and that is our dream
birds laughing voices made us dream,what is our fault and what is country fault,the world has forgotten us.
come closer and love people,because peace is sense and that is our dream
